entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Whale Cove
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 03:36 AM CST Monday 30 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -34.1°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Whale Cove Airport 03:00 AM CST Monday 30 January 2023
Temperature: -34.1°C
Pressure: 100.3 kPa
Humidity: 70 %
Wind Chill: -49
Dewpoint: -37.7°C
Wind: W 21 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Monday: Chance of light snow and blowing snow. High minus 32. POP 60%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 60 percent chance of light snow this morning. Blowing snow late this afternoon. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming north 40 gusting to 60 this afternoon. High minus 32. Wind chill minus 46 this morning and minus 57 this afternoon. Hazardous frostbite conditions. Forecast issued 04:00 AM CST Monday 30 January 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Blowing snow. Low minus 40.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Blowing snow. Wind north 40 km/h gusting to 60. Low minus 40. Wind chill near minus 61. Hazardous frostbite conditions. Forecast issued 04:00 AM CST Monday 30 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Mainly sunny. High minus 35.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Wind northwest 30 km/h. High minus 35. Wind chill minus 59 in the morning and minus 52 in the afternoon. Hazardous frostbite conditions. Forecast issued 04:00 AM CST Monday 30 January 2023
